text: Need Grace Young for Harvey Norman campaign. Budget around $2,013, looking for 3 x Instagram story, 3 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x Facebook post, 2 x Product photography, 3 x Facebook post. 10 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $2,013 budget
